creator: Avi_App
descriptionHtml:
Prayer time — is the most accurate adhan and prayer time app in 2020. This prayer app is created for all Muslims who honor their faith. Prayer is an important aspect of the spiritual life of every righteous Muslim. Unfortunately, it can be difficult for our busy world to set aside time for it. Therefore, our application will help you determine when to pray, keep you up to date with the Islamic calendar, and provide you with many other useful functions for every Muslim. We suggest you get to know the features of this prayer times free app more.

Main functionality

Among the main functions of "Prayer Times, Azan, Quran, Qibla, Namaz Salah Time", the following can be distinguished:
- Prayer time. The prayer schedule app helps you schedule all the important daily prayers. By setting up alerts for namaz time with azan alarm, the app will regularly remind you of fajr prayer, zuhr prayer, asr prayer, maghrib prayer, isha prayer and shuruk prayer at the proper time.
- Islamic calendar. The app will notify you of the holy month of Ramadan and help you keep informed of all Muslim holidays, in particular Eid Al Fitr and Eid Al Adha and others.
- Qibla. Wherever you are, qibla compass will help with high accuracy to determine the direction towards the holy Kaaba. To do this, it is enough to have a connection to the GPS and allow the application to access your location. Use qibla direction, finder
- Mosques nearby search. If you are in an unfamiliar area, mosque finder will show you all the mosques in the vicinity on a map.
- Quran. In the quran app free, you can always read Quran wherever you are.
- 5 pillars of Islam. The application has a separate section devoted to 5 pillars of Islam. It will be especially interesting for children to get to know more about Islam.
- 99 names of Allah. You can read Beautiful Names of Allah at any time.

Advantages

- Simple and intuitive application interface. It is easy to use and ideal for people of all ages.
- You can configure the application so that it regularly sends you notifications about prayer and holidays.
- Namaz time reminder is an ideal application for children when you start introducing them to Islam.
- You can read the Holy Quran, 40 hadiths and find words for prayers at any time.
- The application contains a convenient date converter.
- Prayer schedule is made with all respect to Islam.

How to use Prayer time?

Azan prayer time is very easy to use. It is enough for you:
1. Install the application from the Play Market.
2. In the application menu tab, you will see all the functions listed above available. Choose the ones you are particularly interested in.
3. Set up alerts so that Namaz time regularly reminds you of Namaz and other events.
Faith is an important part of the life of any Muslim prayer. Namaz prayer time will always remind you of Namaz, holidays and help you learn more about Islam. Install the app now to try it!

title: Prayer Times - Azan, Fajr, Dhuhr prayer, Isha

creator: Avi_App
descriptionHtml:
Prayer time — is the most accurate adhan and prayer time app in 2021. This azan is created for Muslims who honor their faith. Prayer is an important aspect of the spiritual life of every righteous Muslim. Unfortunately, it can be difficult for our busy world to set aside time for it. Main functionality of Azan Prayer Time

Among the main functions of "Prayer Times", the following can be distinguished:

- Prayer time. The prayer schedule app helps you schedule all the important daily prayers. By setting up alerts for namaz time with azan alarm, the app will regularly remind you of fajr, zuhr, asr, maghrib, isha and shuruk at the proper time.

- Azan. It means "invitation" or "announcement", means in Islam the call to obligatory prayer, which is recited by the muezzin or azanchi.

- Fajr. Fajr alarm is a dawn prayer in Islam. It is the first of five obligatory daily prayers, which together form the second of the Five Pillars of Islam.

- Islamic calendar. Salat times app will notify you of the holy month of Ramadan and help you keep informed of all Muslim holidays, in particular Eid Al Fitr and Eid Al Adha and others.

- Qibla. Wherever you are, qibla compass will help with high accuracy to determine the direction towards the holy Kaaba. To do this, it is enough to have a connection to the GPS and allow the application to access your location. Use qibla direction, finder

- Mosques nearby search. If you are in an unfamiliar area, mosque finder will show you all the mosques in the vicinity on a map.

- Quran. In the quran app free, you can always read Quran wherever you are.

- 5 pillars of Islam. The application has a separate section devoted to 5 pillars of Islam. It will be especially interesting for children to get to know more about Islam.

- 99 names of Allah. You can read Beautiful Names of Allah at any time.

Advantages

- Simple and intuitive application interface. It is easy to use and ideal for people of all ages.
- You can configure the salah time so that it regularly sends you notifications about prayer and holidays.
- Namaz time reminder is an ideal application for children when you start introducing them to Islam.
- You can read the Holy Quran, 40 hadiths and find words for prayers at any time.
- The application contains a convenient date converter.
- Prayer schedule is made with all respect to Islam.

Azan prayer time is very easy to use. It is enough for you:

1. Install the application from the Play Market.

- 99 names of Allah. You can read Beautiful Names of Allah at any time.

title:
Prayer Times - Azan Pro Muslim
8.6.5

creator: AVIRISE LIMITED HK
descriptionHtml:
Prayer Times – The ultimate Muslim assistant. This app is designed for Muslims who hold their faith close to their hearts. Prayer is a vital part of every righteous Muslim's life, but in our fast-paced world, it can be hard to find time to pray. That's where our Adan Salatuk app comes in, helping you determine the exact time for your prayers, keeping you updated with the Islamic Calendar, and providing a range of features tailored for every Muslim.

Here’s why you’ll love Prayer Times:

Key Features of Prayer Times:

- Prayer Time Alerts: Never miss a prayer with the app’s accurate prayer schedule. Set up notifications for the five daily prayers (Fajr, Zuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha) and Shuruk to be alerted at the exact time, with an optional Azan alarm to notify you.
- Azan/Adhan: The Azan or Adhan (meaning "invitation") is the call to prayer in Islam. It’s played out loud to remind Muslims that it’s time for Salah.
- Fajr Alarm: The first prayer of the day, Fajr, is an essential part of the Five Pillars of Islam. This app ensures you never miss it with a special alarm.
- Islamic Hijri Calendar: The app tracks the Islamic calendar, helping you keep track of important dates such as Ramadan, Eid al-Fitr, and Eid al-Adha.
- Al-Qibla: Wherever you are, the app’s Qibla compass ensures you always know the direction towards the Holy Kaaba. Just allow the app to access your GPS, and it’ll point you in the right direction.
- Mosque Finder: In a new city? The app’s mosque finder will show you nearby mosques on a map, ensuring you can always find a place to pray.
- Quran Access: Read and explore the Quran Kareem anytime, anywhere. The app includes the Holy Quran in Arabic, with an option for Quran in English translation.
- Five Pillars of Islam: Learn about the Five Pillars with a special section designed to educate Muslims of all ages. This feature is especially useful for children.
- 99 Names of Allah: Discover and reflect on the 99 Beautiful Names of Allah anytime you need inspiration.

Why Choose Prayer Times?

- Simple & User-Friendly: The interface is easy to navigate, making it ideal for all ages, from young children learning about Islam to adults.
- Customizable Notifications: Set up prayer time reminders that will notify you about prayer times and important Islamic events.
- Great for Beginners: Whether you're introducing your children to Islam or just starting your journey, this app is designed to guide you step-by-step.
- Always on Hand: The app gives you access to the Quran, Hadith, prayer times, and more, wherever you are.
- Islamic Calendar & Date Converter: The built-in date converter lets you easily switch between the Gregorian and Hijri calendar.
- Accurate & Respectful: The prayer times and features in this app are carefully crafted to respect Islamic principles.

How to Use Prayer Times:

- Open the Prayer Tracker.
- Explore the menu to discover all the available features, from Azan alerts to Qibla direction.
- Set up prayer time notifications so you’ll never miss a prayer again.

Islam is at the heart of everything we do, and this app ensures you stay connected to your faith. With the Azan Prayer Time app, you will always be reminded of your prayers, Islamic holidays, and have easy access to learn more about Islam. Whether you need a Qibla compass, a prayer journal, or a Quran explorer, this app is your perfect Islamic companion.

Download Prayer Times today and experience the convenience of an all-in-one Muslim assistant. Keep up with your prayers, learn about the Five Pillars of Islam, and stay connected to your faith with the best prayer time app available.
